[b]Description:[/b]
This small but very useful utility that you can not only edit your images in different ways, but will also be able to take screenshots of your computer screen. The application has a completely simple and user-friendly interface, as seen in the picture, there is Russian support, by the way, for home use utility is free, so we do not need to register it with you, and download PicPick & nbsp; can be in the full news. 
Perhaps the development of quite a decent amount, for example if you have a system with multiple monitors, it will be possible to do full-screen shots, can be carried out the seizure of the active application, of course, you can also select the desired region itself, for it has a special tool, you can also take pictures full web pages with scrolling, and so on, if you wish, you'll be able to set your image area. 
PicPick is a great graphic editor has a built-in and it filters and effects ready to use them is as simple as the program itself. The images you will be able to transfer by simple drag and drop, generally resembles the Paint Editor, only I think he's a little faster. Especially tell about PicPick nothing, all the basic settings I filmed, so I think they retell it makes no sense. 

Developer: Wiziple software 
License: FreeWare 
Language: Multi + Russian 
OS: Windows
